title: Villareal vs Man United live stream: how to watch Champions League from anywhere
author: kevin-lynch
summary: Can manager-less Man United get back to winning ways?
article: It’s been a week of big upheaval at Old Trafford with the departure of Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, and it’s a tough-looking first test for caretaker boss Michael Carrick as the Red Devils head to Spain for a crucial Champions League group clash.
Follow our guide as we explain how to watch an Villareal vs Man United live stream and catch all the action from the UCL, no matter where you are in the world today.
After the dire 4-1 defeat to Watford in the Premier League that ultimately ended Solskjaer’s reign, United fans will be hoping the Reds can arrest their decline with a win tonight.
They come up against a Villareal side that will be intent on revenge after Ronaldo’s injury time goal robbed them of a share of the points in the reverse fixture at Old Trafford back in September.
Despite the doom and gloom around United, a win tonight would see them go through to the knockout rounds with a game to spare, but those hopes could be hampered by some key injuries.

Luke Shaw is set to miss for the visitors out after being substituted with concussion during the defeat to Watford at the weekend, while strikers Edinson Cavani and Mason Greenwood were also unavailable for that game and face fitness tests for tonight.
Here's how to watch a Champions League Villareal vs Man United live stream today from anywhere in the world.

We've set out below all the ways you can watch tonight's Champions League action in a number of countries around the world. However, if you're away travelling for work or pleasure, you probably won't be able to watch tonight's match like you normally would at home.
That's because of the pesky digital restriction that is geo-blocking, which prevents certain streaming services being accessible only in the region that they're based in.
Help is at hand however if you run into this issue with the option of using a VPN to tune to your preferred coverage no matter where you are in the world.
